form.name: Image field layout -- Fancybox
form.author: ggppdk
form.description: Flexicontent fields - Image field layout - Fancybox parameters

field.name: PPFX_auto_start
field.label: Autoplay
field.description: Delay for auto transitioning to next image

field.name: PPFX_slideshow_delay
field.label: Autoplay delay
field.description: Delay for starting initial auto play

field.name: PPFX_transition_duration
field.label: Transition duration
field.description: Delay for auto transitioning to next image

field.name: PPFX_preload_image
field.label: # of images to preload
field.description: Number of Images to preload. Set to -1 to preload all images

field.name: PPFX_enable_popup
field.label: Slideshow image click
field.description: Click on the image currently active will open image in full screen

field.default:
NOTE: For better visible quality, these thumbnail height is best to be smaller
than the configured thumbnail for current (item/category) view.

field.name: PPFX_use_pages
field.label: Thumbnail list
field.description: Enable to show a thumbnail carousel below or above the slideshow

field.name: PPFX_number_pages
field.label: Max # of pages
field.description: Maximum number of pages to display

field.name: PPFX_enable_top_pager
field.label: Thumbnail navigation
field.description: Thumbnail next / previous navigation arrows, or a separate row of navigation buttons
